artefact.introduction:
Enter your postcode to find DVLA offices near you.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency

details.description: Includes getting a driving licence, fees and tracking your application

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

artefact.title: Apply for your first provisional driving licence

details.description: Apply for your first provisional driving licence online

artefact.title: Replace a lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed driving licence

details.description: Apply for a new driving licence online if it's been lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed

artefact.title: Change the date of your practical driving test

details.description: Change your practical driving test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at

artefact.title: Change the date of your driving theory test

details.description: Change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at
